name: Limit Speed Racing Car 3D
description:
Limit Speed Racing Car 3D!!!
Take control of luxury licensed cars in real asphalt road. Only racing for speed to racers, fire up your car and be the first to cross the finish line!
Features:
- real racing experience with arcade features,
- feel the speed and adrenaline of pro driving,
- beautiful classic tracks to race and win on,
- countless modding options to give you an edge,
